name: Week2 Brief - Intro
description:
A very short and simple self-intro piece. For practice use.

Better with earphones on.
Control: Space Bar & Right Arrow Key.

Royal Free Music from Bensound: Enigmatic - https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/enigmatic
Sound effects: https://freesound.org/

---------

Some reflections:
-Should've use Time.deltaTime to get rid of the time difference.
-The positioning of UI elements.
-Audio loading.
